attributes.action: Stop the Refusal of treatment to Babies and Children at Bedford Hospitals Accident and Emergency
attributes.additional_details:
As parents of children who live in Bedford we need to make it clear that we are NOT prepared to allow our children to suffer or face life changing situations which, without fast access to emergency treatment may become fatal

A 30+mins journey to Luton & Dunstable or Milton Keynes Hospital (traffic permitting) is too much of a risk to further put our children through in an emergency!

Bedford Hospital need to understand that we are not prepared for our children to become another fatality statistic

We will save Accident and Emergency treatment for our children

rejection.details: Please see: Save riverbank ward Bedford
